select l.*,ap.app_name,ai.interface_name api_name from sys_lov l, sys_application ap, sys_interface ai where l.app_id=ap.id and l.api_id=ai.id and l.deleted = 0
and l.lov_code like concat(concat('%',#{lovCode}),'%')
and l.lov_name like concat(concat('%',#{lovName}),'%')
and l.app_id like concat(concat('%',#{appId}),'%')
and l.remarks like concat(concat('%',#{remarks}),'%')
order by lov_code
select l.*,ap.app_name,ai.interface_name api_name from sys_lov l, sys_application ap, sys_interface ai where l.app_id=ap.id and l.api_id=ai.id and l.id = #{id}

SELECT l.lov_name AS title, concat('/', concat(ap.app_code,ai.req_url)) AS url, ai.request_method AS method, l.request_column as requestColumn, l.response_column as responseColumn FROM sys_lov l, sys_application ap, sys_interface ai WHERE l.app_id = ap.id AND l.api_id = ai.id AND l.lov_code = #{code}
SELECT t.*, sa.app_code FROM sys_interface t, sys_lov v, sys_application sa WHERE t.id = v.api_id AND v.lov_code = #{code} AND v.deleted = 0 AND t.app_id = sa.id
